text:
Old mimes die hard

The #Chloroquine myth must now be considered classic #COVID19 misinformation, and has cost many lives. Nobody will properly be held to account for promoting #FakeNews

"All the Ways the Influential Hydroxychloroquine Study Was Crap" https://t.co/Dnvy2rEpNn https://t.co/OqfoUhDONl
